scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>;tag=cb202776 To: <sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Expires: 3600 Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, OPTIONS, BYE, REFER, NOTIFY, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, INFO User-Agent: SIPP Content-Length: 0

REGISTER sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>;tag=cb202776 To: <sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] [field1] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Expires: 3600 Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, OPTIONS, BYE, REFER, NOTIFY, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, INFO User-Agent: SIPP Content-Length: 0
